name: Hush Little Baby
description:
The baby is crying and just won't to go to sleep! Are you up to it?

Be warned though, this seemingly simple task is more horrifying than it appears...

This is a short experience (<10 minutes), but there are 3 possible endings (one is a little hidden - look carefully).

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement
Space/Enter - Action

Most controllers should also work.

Feel free to post your playthroughs in the comments, and let me know if you'd like to see more!

When you're done, why not check out the demo of DATA_BREAK?
